<h5>Checking For Empty Rows</h5>

```{r echo=TRUE}
empty_rows <- is.na(data$loan)
sum(empty_rows)
```

<h5>Checking For Spaces</h5>

```{r echo=TRUE}
space_in_row <- grepl("\\s", data$loan)
sum(space_in_row)
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<h5>Check if all rows have the correct category</h5>

```{r echo=TRUE}
all(data$loan == "yes" | data$loan == "no")
```
